title: [Admission] 2 different categories alloted
content: Hey..is anyone facing the same issue?..For VERIFIED CATEGORY it's showing 3BR and for CATEGORY ALLOTED GMR. Will it affect the counselling. Seniors please help if you had faced the same in the past

comments.body: No it won't affect counselling.  It just means that even if ur category is 3b.. you have been alloted merit seat in general category without the need for reservation.  No issues
